I just got a new Extreme 3D Pro Logitech joystick from my parents this christmas and I am wondering how to get it set up for use in game VIA steam.

Edited December 29, 2013 by daichiazure

At the load screen click on "Settings"

Click on the "Input" button

Click on "Staging UI"

on the right side under "Axis Bindings" click on "None" under "Pitch Axis:"

Move the joystick axis you intend to use for pitch

Repeat for Roll and Yaw

Merry Christmas

Edited December 27, 2013 by Dogface
